channel.title: Uptime going down even when the server is up?
channel.description:
I put a server up for a month with 100% the whole time, then it went down for 1 day due to billing issues. I put it back up, and it's stayed up since. Uptime dropped to 97%, and stayed like that for about a week. Yesterday it went up to 98%, but today it dropped back down to 97%.
I've been checking very often, and the server has been up the entire time other than that one day. Why is it dropping?

item.title: Uptime going down even when the server is up?
